column1: "At such  inquiry the  person  on  whom  summons  under section  6 has
been  served  shall  not be entitled to contest any of the matters stated

that  such  person  may 
in 
the  application  under  section  5  except

establish  that  he  is 
in  possession  or  occupation  of the  land  upon  a

valid  permit  or  other  written  authority  of  the  State  granted 
in
accordance with any written law and  that such  permit or authority is
in force and  not revoked or otherwise rendered  invalid."
